specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Dresses, Partywear, Bridal
